know_more: When adding start with the bigger number and count up!
Subtraction means taking away. 8 fingers minus 4 equals 4!
For subtraction count backwards from the bigger number.
Doubling means adding a number to itself. 9+9=18!
Add the ones first (5+8=13) then add tens (40+10=50) plus carry 50+13=63.
When ones column needs borrowing take 10 from tens column!
Division answers: How many groups? 48÷6=8 because 6x8=48.
To check division multiply your answer by divisor: 9x8=72 ✓
Speed tip: For small numbers use your fingers to count!
Counting back: Start at 7 count back 3: 6 5 4!
6+3=9. These are number friends that make 9!
6x6=36. A square number - same number times itself!
2+3=5. Use your fingers: hold up 2 then 3 more!
8-2=6. Take away means make the number smaller.
6x3=18. Three groups of 6 or six groups of 3!
20÷4=5. How many 4s fit in 20? Five of them!
9x6=54. Pattern: Digits of 9 times tables always add to 9!
Skip counting by 5s like a clock: 5 10 15 20 25!
Counting by 15s: Like quarter hours on a clock!
This is a geometric sequence - multiply by 3 each time!
1/2 is bigger because 2 equal pieces are larger than 4!
3/4 means 3 out of 4 pieces - thats more than half!
2/3 is two slices 1/3 is one slice. More slices = bigger!
Imagine a pizza: half is 2 slices of 4 vs 1 slice of 4!
2/4 equals 1/2! Two quarters make a half.
Count shaded parts over total parts = fraction!
When something is divided into 3 equal parts - each part is 1/3!
Two out of three equal parts = 2/3!
2/4 simplifies to 1/2. Divide top and bottom by 2!
When minute hand points to 12 - read the hour hand!
6:00 - hour hand on 6 minute hand on 12.
9 oclock - the hour hand points to 9!
Half past = 30 minutes. Minute hand on 6!
At :30 the minute hand is on the 6 (bottom).
Quarter past = 15 minutes. Minute hand on 3!
The short hand shows hours the long hand shows minutes.
From :00 to :30 is always 30 minutes (half hour)!
1:00 to 2:00 = 1 hour. Then 2:00 to 2:30 = 30 min. Total: 1.5 hours!
From :00 to :45 is 45 minutes (3 quarters of an hour)!
5 dimes = 50 cents. Thats half a dollar!
Squares have 4 equal sides and 4 right angles!
Circles are perfectly round with no corners!
Rectangles have 4 sides but opposite sides are equal!
Pentagon has 5 sides. Think of the Pentagon building!
HEX means 6. Hexagon = 6 sides like a honeycomb!
OCT means 8. Stop signs are octagons!
Area = side × side. A square with side 2 has area 2×2=4!
2 out of 3 is bigger than 1 out of 3!
2:00 - both hands make an L shape!
5 o'clock - minute hand up hour hand on 5!
Ovals are stretched circles like eggs!
Octagons have 8 sides like stop signs!
Circles have no sides - they're round!
